Utterances: Thanks, can I get the region you are in?
okay, what region do you work in?
Thanks for that, can I get the region that you are located in?

Great!

What is the name of your idea/suggestion?
Thanks, now, can I get the name of your idea/suggestion?
What team within Internal Audit are you a part of? For Example: Finance, Cards, etc
What IA team do you work on? This might be something like Cards or Finance.
Can you please provide a brief description of your suggestion?
Could you please give me a short description of your suggestion?
Who works on this process? Is it a global process?
Who owns this process? Is it global?
Approximately, how much time do we spend on the process now?
About how much time is spent on this, currently?
How much time would we save if we implemented your suggestion?
If we did implement your suggestion how much time would we save?

Does this process provide a better Audit Assurance?

Tip: You can calculate this by determining equivalent effort if done manually
Would this improve our Audit Assurance? Try comparing it to if we did this process maually.
Is this process going to be decommisioned or retired soon? Its okay if you don't know. Just say 'I don't know' or 'skip'
How frequently is this project done? If you don't know just guestimate!
About how much times do we do this process in a month?
How many systems or databases does it interact with? If you don't know just say skip.
Would you like to submit this?
